name: layout_center
description: A workspace layout where one window is centered and maximized while others are in the background.

commands.name: layout_center
commands.short_description: turn on/off or change the active window.
commands.full_description:
<toggle|next|prev|next2|prev2> turn on/off or change the active window.

Args:
    what: The action to perform
        - toggle: Enable/disable the centered layout
        - next/prev: Focus the next/previous window in the stack
        - next2/prev2: Alternative focus commands (configurable)

config.name: margin
config.description: Margin around the centered window in pixels

config.name: offset
config.description: Offset of the centered window as 'X Y' or [X, Y]

config.name: style
config.description: Window rules to apply to the centered window

config.name: captive_focus
config.description: Keep focus on the centered window

config.name: on_new_client
config.description: Behavior when a new window opens

config.name: next
config.description: Command to run when 'next' is called and layout is disabled

config.name: prev
config.description: Command to run when 'prev' is called and layout is disabled
